extendedInfo.description: Learn Thai is a free, easy to use mobile Thai Phrase Book that will give visitors to Thailand and those who are interested in learning to speak Thai a good start in the language. â¦ Get the full set of phrasebooks for FREE! Search for "codegent" and download more languages.. Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Vietnamese, Spanish, French, & many more. â¦Learn Thai is developed by Thai people and we have tried our best to be authentic in the pronunciation whilst ensuring it is easy to understand. We use native Thai speakers and have spoken clearly and slowly to help you follow the phrases with ease.Click link below to download Pro version with over 800 phrases and 12 more categories. Top rated phrasebook for Android. âââââ - Only 150 bahthttps://market.android.com/details?id=com.codegent.learnthaiproFEATURES* Carefully translated list of essential phrases* High quality audio pronunciation by native speaker* Play all phrases automatically in each category* Ability to adjust font size* No internet connection required* Highlight important words with tips* Store frequently used phrases in favourites* Search by keywords* No adverts or annoying popupsCATEGORIESThe LITE version contains 400+ essential phrases. - Greetings- General conversation- Numbers- Directions and places- Transportation- Eating outUpgrade and unlock all 900+ phrases in these categories.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.codegent.learnthaipro* Time and date* Accommodation* Shopping* Colours* Towns and provinces* Countries* Tourist attractions* Family* Dating* Emergency* Feeling sick* Tongue twistersFEEDBACKIf you like this app and find it useful please take a few seconds to give us a rating in the Android Market. For comments and suggestions please send an email to apps@codegent.com. We love getting feedback from users of our apps.Follow us on twitter : http://www.twitter.com/codegentappsALSO AVAILABLE FOR IPHONE, IPOD, & IPADhttp://itunes.apple.com/app/learnthai-pro-phrase-book/id428467489?mt=8

reviews.title: Very good.
reviews.comment: Downloaded this, looked through it and instantly upgraded to Pro version...... the best phrasebook I\'ve come across yet and far easier to use than an actual book...... enough said....!
reviews.author: Charlie Gould

reviews.title: Great app,very informative
reviews.comment: Extensive, good pronounciation, very helpfull, one of the best,
reviews.author: Torben Harboe

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Definitely recommend, will be buying full version when I get paid.
reviews.author: Ryan Morgan

reviews.title: Brilliant app to get by in Thailand
reviews.comment: Loved this app from word go, crystal clear pronunciation and useful day to day phrases. The only way I would improve it is by keeping the favourites icon on screen at all times in stead of having to enter a phrase section first to access them,  I\'d also like to see a slow down repeat option of the phrase, word for word,  so you can practice the phrase in sections. Apart from that,  brilliant!
reviews.author: Jason Beech

reviews.title: Perfect app for getting around the Thai language!
reviews.comment: All the basics are covered and there are enough phrases to get you through any situation and communicate what you need. No this is not Rosetta stone so don\'t expect this robust platform. This app is simple and serves as a perfect pocket translator for on the fly phrases! Great app!
reviews.author: aaron post

reviews.comment: Not bad for basic translations and getting a flavor of the language
reviews.author: Aamir Ibrahim

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: van biak

reviews.title: Really basic to the point of being useless.
reviews.comment: Hope all the men understand the female voice \"ka\". As a male you say kahp.
reviews.author: Dirk Diggler

reviews.comment: Very good, great...
reviews.author: Shane Rawson

reviews.comment: Very good.
reviews.author: David Cunliffe

reviews.comment: Very useful
reviews.author: myo minn oo

reviews.comment: I liked it
reviews.author: Kasey Mcdermott

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Fun to use
reviews.author: Nicholas Lim

reviews.title: Really enjoying practising.
reviews.comment: Seems really easy for practising the phrases. Time will tell how well I\'ve done on our Thai holiday.
reviews.author: Jacqueline De Felice

reviews.title: Huge
reviews.comment: This is a great app for beginning Thai. Used it on my first trip to Thailand and because of the emphasis on actual pronunciation, I received several compliments from Thai acquaintences on my efforts.
reviews.author: Tom Atkins

reviews.title: Very easy and good
reviews.comment: Good,easy learn and easy use.
reviews.author: Ken Wong

reviews.title: Seems to be a good app.
reviews.comment: 3 negatives: In the top left there appears to be a back button that doesn\'t work in the app (*bug*) and the \'lite\' version seems to have a slightly too limited choice of phrases. Last one is that it won\'t install on my Nexus S and I\'ve seen someone else say that too.  Positives: male/female voices, tips along with some of the phrases, no ads, explain certain language features ( like why krap at the end of 80% of the sentences), works offline,
reviews.author: Joseph Hannon

reviews.comment: Great app for simple common phrases. Male voice pronounces very clear and easy to follow.\tExpanded dictionary word search would be a nice advancement for this app.
reviews.author: Matthew Hedeen

reviews.title: Thai-Lite
reviews.comment: I love this app! Very functionable. Was able to pick up fast and the transliterations are excellent! Tai D. Doram, CNMI
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Proving very useful on our Thai trip - pronunciation seems a bit odd at times but very helpful nonetheless. However, having Emergency and Feeling Sick as pro only seems a bit unkind, somebody might really need to access those when least expected and being in a foreign country they may well not have the data access to do so. I will buy the pro version anyway because it\'s a great app :-)
reviews.author: Helen Sherwood-Taylor
